plot: When Cesar finds himself without any further options, he carjacks Marcia. Shortly thereafter, in the heat of panic, Cesar must decide whether to flee or to help.
title: Último Recurso
plot_es: When Cesar finds himself without any further options, he carjacks Marcia. Shortly thereafter, in the heat of panic, Cesar must decide whether to flee or to help.
plot_en: When Cesar finds himself without any further options, he carjacks Marcia. Shortly thereafter, in the heat of panic, Cesar must decide whether to flee or to help.
